Body:
Description: We have been told by a Netwrix support representative that our version of PingCastle should support a higher version of .NET that version 6. However, after having installed version 8 and removing version 6, the web console just gives us errors that the .NET version is wrong.

Are there specific instructions, or a particular procedure to upgrade to a higher .NET version and subsequently and remove .NET 6, as in five days, this becomes a security failure for us and we'll need to remove or shutdown the product?

Thank you!

Next Steps Updated: We are aware of the need to upgrade ASP.NET from v6 as it ending the support life.
Escalating to R&D
What We've Learned Updated: We are aware of the need to upgrade ASP.NET from v6 as it ending the support life on 12/11/24.
Next Steps Updated: Escalating to R&D
Sent information to customer explaining that they can upgrade to .NET 8 Hosting Bundle with the new version of PC
